targets.expr: (sum(jvm_memory_used{application="$application", instance="$instance", area="heap", namespace="$Namespace"}) * 100) / sum(jvm_memory_max{application="$application", instance="$instance", area="heap", namespace="$Namespace"})

(sum(jvm_memory_used{application="$application", instance="$instance", area="nonheap", namespace="$Namespace"}) * 100) / sum(jvm_memory_max{application="$application", instance="$instance", area="nonheap", namespace="$Namespace"})
